page.title: 10Customs Festival in Jedburgh
page.content: Each July a festival is held in Jedburgh.A Callant is chosen to lead the festvities.The Callant is a young man born in Jedburgh.His name is kept a close secret till Declaration Night. His task is to lead the cavalcade of horses.The Callant rides with his right and left hand men and his herald.His herald rides on horseback in front of him,his right and left hand men at his sides.These men were once Callants themselves.The rideouts lead to villages round about such as Southdean,Lanton,Ancrum, Morebattle and outlying districts. Redeswire is an important rideout because it leads to an ancient battle field.All these festivities are to remind people about past rides round our marches to check that our lands were safe from encroachment.
